identity.name: Santia
identity.mission: Democratize access to healthcare in Cameroon through a mobile-first, trust-driven digital clinic.
identity.aesthetic: Modern Village Clinic - Digital efficiency meets human warmth. High contrast for trust, warm neutrals for accessibility.
identity.target_audience: Cameroon residents, mobile-first users, seeking immediate medical advice.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero headlines, and modal headers. Letter-spacing: tight (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, inputs, labels, and button text.

primary.description: Deep Midnight Blue - Use for Primary Buttons, Footer, Headings.

secondary.description: Health Green - Use for Success states, Icons, Active borders, 'Call to Action' highlights.

background.description: White for cards, Slate-50 for main backgrounds, Warm-white for 'Human' sections.

rules: Primary buttons must be #0A2540 with white text.
Secondary actions (like 'Back') should be outline or ghost.
Use the 'Warm' background (#FDFBF7) for the Testimonials/Trust section to break the sterility.

strategies: MOBILE FIRST: Design for the thumb zone. Primary CTA must be easily reachable.
STICKY CTA: On mobile, the 'Commencer' button should be sticky at the bottom for the Consultation flow.
BENTO GRID: Use a bento-style grid for the 'Specialties' section on desktop (asymmetric cards).

buttons.primary: bg-[#0A2540] text-white hover:bg-[#0A2540]/90 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-[#0A2540] border-2 border-[#0A2540] hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-semibold transition-all

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl border border-slate-100 shadow-[0_4px_20px_-4px_rgba(10,37,64,0.08)] hover:shadow-[0_8px_30px_-4px_rgba(10,37,64,0.12)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.style: h-14 rounded-xl border-slate-200 focus:border-[#0A2540] focus:ring-[#0A2540] bg-slate-50 focus:bg-white transition-all text-lg

navigation.mobile: Simple header with Logo (Left) and Hamburger (Right).

visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-2xl (1rem) for cards, rounded-full for buttons.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows using the primary blue color at very low opacity (5-10%).
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide-React icons. Stroke width: 2px. Color: #2ECC71 (Green) or #0A2540 (Blue).
visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'noise' texture on the dark blue footer to give it a paper-like feel.

images.description: Professional African doctor smiling in white coat. Use for Hero section.
Doctor checking patient blood pressure. Use for 'Comment ça marche' or Trust section.
Smiling happy woman. Use for Testimonials or Success Confirmation page.

sections: Hero: Headline 'Votre médecin, dans votre poche.', Subhead 'Consultation médicale en ligne au Cameroun.', CTA 'Commencer une consultation'. Image: hero_doctor.
Specialties_Grid: Bento grid of 5 categories (Sexologie, Addictions, Poids, Sommeil, Cheveux).
How_It_Works: 3 Steps (1. Choisissez le motif, 2. Répondez aux questions, 3. Un médecin vous rappelle).

consultation.layout: Multi-step wizard. Progress bar at top.
steps: Step 1: Motif (Grid of cards with icons).
Step 3: Info Patient (Inputs for Name, Age, Phone, City).
Step 4: Recap (Summary card + Consent checkbox + Submit button).

confirmation.content: Success Icon (Green Check), Headline 'Merci !', Subhead 'Un médecin va analyser votre dossier et vous contacter sous 15 minutes.', Button 'Retour à l\'accueil'.

instructions_to_main_agent: USE 'framer-motion' for smooth page transitions and step changes in the form.
USE 'react-hook-form' + 'zod' for the intake form validation.
ENSURE the 'Urgence' disclaimer is visible: 'Ce service n\'est pas pour les urgences vitales. En cas d\'urgence, appelez le 112.'
MOBILE OPTIMIZATION: Ensure touch targets are at least 44px.
DO NOT use gradients for the primary blue background. Keep it solid and deep.
IMPLEMENT the 'Sticky Bottom CTA' on mobile for the consultation form to ensure high conversion.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include `data-testid` attribute.
